content: and front 48 50 52 52 52 54 58 62 sts each sleeve change to ribbing needle and k 1 round divide for body and sleeves begin ribbing pattern as follows *k3 p1 repeat from * to bor m note with the exception of the bor m remove all other raglan m as you come to them on next round work in est rib pattern for 3 5 /9cm beginning at bor m knit across back sts place sleeve sts with gauge needle bobble all sts in pattern on holder co 4 6 10 12 16 20 24 28 sts for under- arm using the backward-loop method knit across front sts place next sleeve sts on holder co 4 6 10 12 16 20 finishing 24 28 sts for underarm using the backward-loop method work across remaining back sts 144 156 168 184 200 216 232 248 sts rem for body weave in ends to ws wet block to measurements body continuing in the round work even in st st until piece mea- sures 7 / 17 5cm from underarm or desired body length less 3 5 / 9cm for the cuff change to ribbing needle and k 1 round begin ribbing pattern as follows *k3 p1 repeat from * to bor m work in est rib pattern for 3 5 /9cm with gauge needle bobble all sts in pattern sleeves both the same place 48 50 52 52 52 54 58 62 sts of one sleeve on shorter circular gauge needle with rs facing starting at the center of the underarm join yarn and pick up and knit 2 3 5 6 8 10 12 14 sts in underarm work across sleeve sts then pick up and knit 2 3 5 6 8 10 12 14
